parameters.name: Ipv6GatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv6 gateway.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description:
The name of the IPv6 gateway.

The name must be 2 to 256 characters in length, and can contain letters, digits, periods (.), underscores (\_), and hyphens (-). The name must start with a letter and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the IPv6 gateway is deployed. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) to which the IPv6 gateway belongs.
